comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of light grilled cheese sandwiches and y be the number of heavy grilled cheese sandwiches.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "2x + 3y \leq 300 (bread constraint)",
        "3x + 5y \leq 500 (cheese constraint)",
        "y \geq 3x (at least 3 times as many heavy sandwiches as light sandwiches)",
        "x \geq 0",
        "y \geq 0"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Minimize 10x + 15y (total production time)"
}
